text:

Patty Duke Dies of Sepsis: Remembering the Star Through Pictures Published Updated 2:01 pm EST, March 29, 2016 5 Comments By Lauren Weigle 202 Share Tweet Follow Patty Duke Oscar-winning actress Anna "Patty Duke" Pearce, 69, has died of sepsis from a ruptured intestine, according to USA Today . Her representative Mitchell Stubbs released the following statement: Anna 'Patty Duke' Pearce passed away this morning March 29, 2016 at 1:20 am. Her cause of death was sepsis from a ruptured intestine. She was a wife, a mother, a grandmother, a friend, a mental health advocate and a cultural icon. She will be missed. Most known for playing "identical cousins" on The Patty Duke Show , she was truly beloved over the years. Recently, the star celebrated her 30th anniversary with her husband Mike. Let's remember the star through pictures and learn more about her life, death, husband and battle with bipolar disorder over the years. (Getty) Next Image: Social Security Administration Reunites The Cast Of "The Patty Duke Show" Lauren Weigle is a senior contributor to Heavy specializing in celebrity and reality television. She has an extensive background in entertainment, fashion, PR, lifestyle and journalism. Follow her on Twitter @NYCPRTeam . March 29, 2016 2:01 pm
